DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics (PK), safety, and tolerability of Brivanib in Chinese subjects with Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC).
DOC.brief_title: Determine the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Brivanib in Chinese Subjects With Advanced Primary Liver Cancer (Hepatocellular Carcinoma: HCC)
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com.
